msContents.summary: Account recording payments for dike tax by fifteen persons residing in various quarters of Oxyrhynchus

msItemStruct.note: Written along the fibers; back blank
The hand is a tiny, rapid cursive

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.

div.ab: for the tax on the dike of Hippodromos, Petesouchos s. of Papontos, 6 dr. 4 obols; for the tax on the dike of Hippodromos, Papontos s. of Harpasis, 6 dr. 4 obols; for the tax on the dike of Hippodromos, Harpasis s. of Harsiesis, 6 dr. 4 obols; for the tax on the dike of Dromos Gymnasios, Glaukias s. of Ptolemaios of the mother; [l.5] Kleopatra, and his brother Sarapion, 13 dr. 2 obols; for the tax on the dike of Kretikos, Akoris s. of Satyros of the mother Harseis, 6 dr. 4 obols; for the tax on the dike of Kretikos, Sarapion s. of Horos of the mother Sinthoonis, 6 dr. 4 obols; for the tax on the dike of Upper Parembole, Dioskoros s. of Dioskoros of the mother Tanenteri, 6 dr. 4 obols; for the tax on the dike of Kretikos, Apollonios s. of Komon of the mother Tapotamon, 6 dr. 4 obols; [l. 10] for the tax on the dike of Thoeris, Kleopatros s. of Didymos, 6 dr. 4 obols; for the tax on the dike of Plateia, Dionysios s. of Epitynchanon (?) of the mother E[...], 6 dr. 4 obols; for the tax on the dike of Dromos Gymnasios, Asklas s. of Horion of the mother Heras, 6 dr. 4 obols; for the tax on the dike of Poimenikos, Syros s. of Diodoros of the mother Dionysia, 6 dr. 4 obols; for the tax on the dike of Ibiotapheios, Heras s. of Tryphon, 6 dr. 4 obols; [l. 15] for the tax on the dike of Dromos Thoeris, Kerdon s. of Apollonios s. of Harthosis(?) 6 dr. 4 obols; . . .

listBibl.bibl: P.Princ. II 46 M. Del Fabbro, "Note a papiri ossirinchiti," StudPap 21 (1982): 19-22
